## Accessing HTML attributes

```{r setup, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
gbbo <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Great_British_Bake_Off")
gbbo |> 
  html_elements("div.hatnote.navigation-not-searchable > a") |>
  html_attr("href")
```

## Accessing HTML attributes

```{r}
gbbo |> 
  html_elements("div.hatnote.navigation-not-searchable > a") |>
  html_text2()
```
